about_the_game:
TeamPlay is a game in which you can achieve maximum team chemistry. The gameplay is based on a team sports game - volleyball, which takes place on a tropical island.

Play with friends against each other on the same device or create a team to play cross-network matches. Enjoy cross-platform play between Android, iOS and PC. The number of players in a match is limited only by the number of input devices. Your team can consist not only of living people, but also of trained artificial intelligence.

Main features

  • Ability to play multiple players on one computer using a keyboard and multiple gamepads.
  • Ability to play on a smartphone.
  • Teaching artificial intelligence for general play.
detailed_description:
TeamPlay is a game in which you can achieve maximum team chemistry. The gameplay is based on a team sports game - volleyball, which takes place on a tropical island.

Play with friends against each other on the same device or create a team to play cross-network matches. Enjoy cross-platform play between Android, iOS and PC. The number of players in a match is limited only by the number of input devices. Your team can consist not only of living people, but also of trained artificial intelligence.

Main features

  • Ability to play multiple players on one computer using a keyboard and multiple gamepads.
  • Ability to play on a smartphone.
  • Teaching artificial intelligence for general play.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 19.10
  • Processor: FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 640
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.10
  • Processor: Ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: TeamPlay is a game where you can achieve maximum team chemistry. Play with friends against each other on the same device or create a team to play cross-network matches. Your team can consist not only of living people, but also of trained artificial intelligence.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
